root.name: Hamilton's Great Adventure
root.description: OverviewThe player primarily controls explorer Ernest Hamilton, switching at times to his bird Sasha (in co-op, the second player controls Sasha). The game is broken up into short levels, in which the goal is to collect keys and reach the exit. Sasha is able to reach switches that are off the main path, clearing obstacles for Hamilton.Co-op can only be played locally in both versions of the game.The game is built on the Bitsquid Tech engine.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows Vista / Windows 7Processor: Dual Core 2.4GHz processorMemory: 2GBHard Disk Space: 1GBVideo Card: Shader 4.0 compatible card (minimum: Nvidia GeForce 8xxx, AMD Radeon 2xxx)DirectXÂ®: Direct3D 11
